nodes.text: Thalassians were a sentient species, some of whom worked as slavers. During the reign of the Galactic Republic, the Er'Kit Senator Danry Ledwellow accepted bribes from Thalassian slavers and allowed them to operate on his species' homeworld. Around five years before the Battle of Yavin, the Galactic Empire's 291st Legion raided a nest of Thalassian slavers on the planet Galpos II using All Terrain Defense Pods.
